articles.title: ICC junks Duterte request to disqualify 2 judges from deciding jurisdiction issue
articles.description: The plenary of judges of the International Criminal Court has rejected the request of former President Rodrigo Duterte that two ICC judges be disqualified from deciding his challenge to the jurisdiction of the court as regards his case.

articles.title: NASA Slightly Raises Odds of Asteroid Hitting the Moon in 2032 After Updated JWST Data
articles.description: NASA adjusts the 2032 lunar impact risk of asteroid 2024 YR4 to 4.3% after new data from JWST
articles.content: The likelihood of asteroid 2024 YR4 pummelling into the moon in December 2032 has been increased by new data gathered by the James Webb Space Telescope (JWST) by NASA. Feared to be the largest Earth impact threat ever detected, the asteroid's odds of... [2246 chars]

articles.title: Android 16 is out, complete with live notification updates and new camera features
articles.description: Google has released Android 16, which is now available for compatible devices. It boasts several new features, including camera upgrades and live notification updates.
articles.content:

articles.title: 'We've got a new mystery on our hands': Titan's weird wobble just got even stranger
articles.description: New research reveals more about why Saturn's large moon tilts, a puzzle that has intrigued scientists for decades.
articles.content:
Saturn's moon Titan has been a focus of experts for decades as its atmosphere has a strange tilt to it.

articles.title: Mario Kart World is the perfect Switch 2 launch game
articles.description: Mario Kart World is the sequel to the bestselling Mario Kart 8, and it’s an ideal launch title for the Nintendo Switch 2.
articles.content: All sequels have to live up to their predecessors in some form, but few have as daunting a task as Mario Kart World. It’s a follow-up to the best-selling game across Nintendo’s last two console generations, and a game that eventually doubled in size ... [5499 chars]

articles.title: Converting Captured Carbon Dioxide into Cement Precursors
articles.description: A new U-M method transforms carbon dioxide into metal oxalates, offering a sustainable solution for cement production and addressing environmental pollution.
articles.content:
Researchers at the University of Michigan (U-M) have helped develop a new method to turn carbon dioxide into useful materials for cement production.
